unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent infusion. We at Tata Consultancy Services see immense potential in graduates from IIT Delhi and other prestigious institutions. Our next drive is scheduled for 25/12/2023, 10:00 hrs. We offer competitive packages, starting at Rs. 8 Lakhs. Look forward to connecting with budding engineers on 14/01/2024 and 01/03/2024 to build the next generation of India's tech workforce.
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent infusion. We at T C S see immense potential in graduates from I I T Delhi and other prestigious institutions. Our next drive is scheduled for twenty fifth december two thousand and twenty three, ten zero zero hours. We offer competitive packages, starting at rupee eight lakhs. Look forward to connecting with budding engineers on fourteenth january two thousand and twenty four and first march two thousand and twenty four to build the next generation of India's tech workforce.
